description: This script manages the power states of RDKB components by performing orderly shutdowns and startups based on specified power modes. It includes functions for displaying usage information, stopping, and starting various services necessary for power management.

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Displays usage information for the script and exits.

methods.name: PwrMgr_TearDownComponents
methods.description: Performs an orderly shutdown of specific RDKB components and services.

methods.name: PwrMgr_StartupComponents
methods.description: Performs an ordered startup of RDKB components and services.
